title: Integration Strategies for Scholarship of Teaching and Learning (SoTL) and Educational Development (ED) in Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Operated in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, with learners possessing advanced expertise in social fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core concepts and interconnections of SoTL (Scholarship of Teaching and Learning) and SoED (Scholarship of Educational Development).
Learners can design research questions and apply literature review methods to solve teaching and learning problems.
Learners can propose strategies for educational development (ED) professionals to integrate scholarly research capabilities (SoED).
Learners can develop evaluation criteria for blended learning design in resource-constrained technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
